title: Braided Dimensions
description: Braided Dimensions blends Celtic mythology, ancient history, and modern-day mystery, where ancient and modern worlds collide. It follows Kay, a former professor of ancient languages, who finds herself drawn into a hidden realm of magic and danger. Transported to a mysterious medieval world on Halloween night, she meets Baird, a handsome stranger who claims to know her spirit, and Duff, a burly friend who welcomes her as Kyna, as long-lost kin. Kay joins them in a festive celebration of Samhain, the Celtic New Year, where she discovers she can dance, sing, and understand their arcane tongue. She also sees ghostly figures and strange creatures that haunt the night. But when dawn comes, she returns to her own time and place still holding a silver pendant that connects her to Baird and his world. Will she ever see him again? And who is Kyna, the woman she resembles so much? Together, they must unravel the secrets of their connection and face the forces that threaten to tear them apart. You will be hooked from the first page to the last, as you follow Kay and Baird on their journey across dimensions in this novel of romance, adventure, and magic.
author: Marie Judson
